Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Castle Hill business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Castle Hill business improvement district.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the West Village business improvement district
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the Sutphin Boulevard Business Improvement District, an extension of the boundaries of such district, a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge in such district is based, and an increase in the maximum total amount to be expended for improvements in such district, and setting the date, time and place for the public hearing of the local law authorizing such changes as set forth in the amended district plan of the Sutphin Boulevard Business Improvement District.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sutphin Boulevard (Downtown Jamaica) Business Improvement District.

Items.Title: Southern & Willis.YR15.FY22, Block 2268, Lot 13, Block 2285, Lots 1, 2, and 3, Block 2683, Lot 90; Bronx, Community Districts No. 1 and 2, Council District No. 8.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Southern & Willis.YR15.FY22, Block 2268, Lot 13, Block 2285, Lots 1, 2, and 3, Block 2683, Lot 90; Bronx, Community Districts No. 1 and 2, Council District No. 8.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Castle Hill business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the Castle Hill business improvement district.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the West Village business improvement district
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution authorizing an increase in the amount to be expended annually in the Sutphin Boulevard Business Improvement District, an extension of the boundaries of such district, a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge in such district is based, and an increase in the maximum total amount to be expended for improvements in such district, and setting the date, time and place for the public hearing of the local law authorizing such changes as set forth in the amended district plan of the Sutphin Boulevard Business Improvement District.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Sutphin Boulevard (Downtown Jamaica) Business Improvement District.

Items.Title: Southern & Willis.YR15.FY22, Block 2268, Lot 13, Block 2285, Lots 1, 2, and 3, Block 2683, Lot 90; Bronx, Community Districts No. 1 and 2, Council District No. 8.
Items.ActionName: Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Committee with Companion Resolution approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Southern & Willis.YR15.FY22, Block 2268, Lot 13, Block 2285, Lots 1, 2, and 3, Block 2683, Lot 90; Bronx, Community Districts No. 1 and 2, Council District No. 8.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Speaker Adams
